=== mac ===
1. use key to choose and confirm
   * keyboard -> mission control -> All controls.
   * then select with tab and confirm with space.
2. 快速存储图片: skitch 截图，cmd+e 
3. 设置 ctrl + hjkl 为上下左右的方式： https://github.com/kkamdooong/hammerspoon-control-hjkl-to-arrow ， 可以了解 hammerspoon 这个工具，通过 lua 脚本实现强大的系统定制功能。
 
=== iterm ===
{{{
cmd-d               # split window 
cmd-shift-d         # split window vertically
cmd+[,]             # select left/right window,
}}}
